intro: This document provides a comprehensive description of the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS) products offered within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service. It aims to equip users with a thorough understanding of the EGMS Basic, Calibrated, and Ortho products, detailing their specifications, formats, attribute tables, and associated metadata. The document also covers essential aspects such as map projections, data downloading procedures, ancillary datasets used in EGMS production, and the conventions governing file naming and measurement point coding, with a specific focus on InSAR-derived ground motion data.
